entry.title: BCD Changes Report, Tue Apr 23 2024 09:26:28 GMT+0000 (Coordinated Universal Time) - Tue Apr 30 2024 23:18:44 GMT+0000 (Coordinated Universal Time)
entry.summary: Weekly summary of changes to BCD data
entry.content:
BCD Changes Report, Tue Apr 30 2024

Summary of BCD changes
from Tue Apr 23 2024 09:26:28 GMT+0000 (Coordinated Universal Time)
to Tue Apr 30 2024 23:18:44 GMT+0000 (Coordinated Universal Time)
